mapper.select: SELECT d.codpar, d.codp, d.codmat, d.gestion, d.ids, mt.nombre AS nombreMateria, p.nombre AS nombreParalelo, CONCAT(per.nombre, ' ', per.ap, ' ', COALESCE(per.am, '')) AS nombreDocente, u.email AS emailDocente, per.tipo AS tipoDocente FROM academico.dicta d INNER JOIN academico.materia mt ON d.codmat = mt.codmat INNER JOIN academico.paralelo p ON d.codpar = p.codp INNER JOIN public.sys_user u ON d.ids = u.id INNER JOIN academico.personal per ON d.ids = per.idusuario WHERE d.codpar = #{codpar} AND d.codp = #{codp} AND d.codmat = #{codmat} AND d.gestion = #{gestion}

SELECT d.codpar, d.codp, d.codmat, d.gestion, d.ids, mt.nombre AS nombreMateria, p.nombre AS nombreParalelo, mt.codn, n.nombre AS nombreNivel FROM academico.dicta d INNER JOIN academico.materia mt ON d.codmat = mt.codmat INNER JOIN academico.paralelo p ON d.codpar = p.codp LEFT JOIN academico.niveles n ON mt.codn = n.codn WHERE d.ids = #{ids} AND d.gestion = #{gestion} ORDER BY mt.nombre ASC, p.nombre ASC

SELECT d.codpar, d.codp, d.codmat, d.gestion, d.ids, p.nombre AS nombreParalelo, CONCAT(per.nombre, ' ', per.ap, ' ', COALESCE(per.am, '')) AS nombreDocente, u.email AS emailDocente, per.tipo AS tipoDocente FROM academico.dicta d INNER JOIN academico.paralelo p ON d.codpar = p.codp INNER JOIN public.sys_user u ON d.ids = u.id INNER JOIN academico.personal per ON d.ids = per.idusuario WHERE d.codmat = #{codmat} AND d.gestion = #{gestion} ORDER BY p.nombre ASC
